On April 23, 2024, Tesla, Inc. released its financial results for the quarter ended March 31, 2024 by posting its First Quarter 2024 Update on its website. The full text of the update is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. &#160; This information is intended to be furnished under Item 2.02 of Form 8-K, &#8220;Results of Operations and Financial Condition&#8221; and shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing. &#160; Item 9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits.
